title: Mel B, 44, had a secret 'wild fling' with James Arthur who is 13 years younger than her
text:

Mel B allegedly had a "wild fling" with X Factor star James Arthur in the past.

They crossed paths as James performed on America's Got Talent when Scary Spice was a judge on the show in 2017.

It's claimed they enjoyed a secret romance after the breakdown of Mel's 10-year marriage to Stephen Belafonte.

She was said to be out filming America's Got Talent in Los Angeles.

They were both single when the fling was said to have taken place.

Singer James is 13 years younger than super star Mel, yet it was alleged they hit it off instantly.

(Image: Getty Images)

An insider told The Sun : “Mel met James soon after her marriage ended while she was working in LA on America's Got Talent.

“They were brought together by Simon Cowell who secured James an opportunity to perform on the show.

“James was single at the time and they hit it off instantly... They had a wild fling and loved spending time together, but it ended respectfully.”

(Image: Getty Images)

The Mirror has approached representatives for Mel B and James Arthur for further comment.

Mel has yet to go public with a new love since the demise of her marriage to Stephen Belafonte.

She filed for a divorce from her ex-husband in 2017 and the romance is alleged to have happened sometime after.

Recently, James is rumoured to be dating his dancer Jessica Grist.

He was previously romantically linked to singer Rita Ora in 2013.
